body: @benoitsteiner Thank you for the update. It would be wonderful if all involved partners in @KhronosGroup (Google, Nvidia, Amd, Intel, Codeplay, Xilinx etc.) will promote a cudnn like API in a standardized way. A sort of Khronos [openvx](http://www.gipsa-lab.grenoble-inp.fr/thematic-school/gpu2015/presentations/GIPSA-Lab-GPU2015-T-Lepley.pdf) computer vision standardization effort but for deep learning.
